definitions.definition: A follower of the Ahmadiyya Muslim Jama'at (a religious movement based on Sunni Islam ).
examples: Several of my Ahmadi friends are fasting because it's Ramadan.

definitions.definition: A follower of the Ahmadi Religion of Peace and Light (a new religious movement based on Twelver Shia Islam ).

main_definition: A follower of the Ahmadiyya Muslim Jama'at (a religious movement based on Sunni Islam ).
secondary_definitions: A follower of the Ahmadi Religion of Peace and Light (a new religious movement based on Twelver Shia Islam ).
